pending.heading: Profile Verification Pending
pending.thankYou: Thank you for submitting your profile! Your information is currently under review.
pending.processTime: This process usually takes 1-2 business days. We will notify you via email once your profile has been verified.
pending.meantime: In the meantime, you can check the status later or return to the homepage.

rejected.heading: Profile Verification Rejected
rejected.sorry: We're sorry, but your profile verification has been rejected. Please review the rejection reason below and update your profile accordingly.
rejected.afterUpdate: After updating your profile, our team will review your information again. You'll receive an email once your profile has been verified.

profileCreate.emailInUseTooltip: Email is already in use. Please choose a different email.
profileCreate.emailInUseMessage: The email address is already in use. Please use a different email to continue.
profileCreate.profileStatusChangeNoticeMessage: Editing your profile will reset your verification status to 'pending'. While your profile is in pending status, it will not be visible to employers until our team reviews and approves the changes. Do you want to proceed to the edit page?

personalInfo.sectionDescription: Please provide your basic personal information. Fields marked with * are required.
personalInfo.additionalInfoDescription: The following fields are optional but may be required for certain positions.
personalInfo.dobNote: Must be at least 18 years old and cannot be in the future
personalInfo.emailNote: Email cannot be changed as it's used as a unique identifier for this profile.
personalInfo.mobileNote: Mobile number cannot be changed as it's used as a unique identifier for this profile.
personalInfo.licenseOrPassportRequired: Either a license number or passport number is required
personalInfo.sinNumberNote: Enter a valid 9-digit Canadian SIN using numbers only (no spaces or dashes). This information is encrypted and securely stored.
personalInfo.sinExpiryRequired: SIN Expiry is required if SIN is provided

address.sectionDescription: Please provide your current address. All fields are required.

qualifications.sectionDescription: Please provide your qualifications and work preferences. Fields marked with * are required.
qualifications.workPreferenceRequired: Work preference is required and must be at least 10 characters
qualifications.bioRequired: Bio is required and must be at least 100 characters
qualifications.bioMaxLength: Bio must be 500 characters or less

compensation.sectionDescription: Please provide your compensation information. Fields marked with * are required.
compensation.overtimeHoursRequired: Overtime hours is required when overtime is enabled
compensation.overtimeBillRateRequired: Overtime bill rate is required when overtime is enabled
compensation.overtimePayRateRequired: Overtime pay rate is required when overtime is enabled

documents.sectionDescription: Upload required documents (PDF format, max 2MB). At least one document is required.
documents.willBeUploadedNote: Will be uploaded when you save
documents.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only PDF files are allowed.
documents.fileSizeExceeded: File size exceeds the 2MB limit. Current size: {{size}}
documents.cannotPreview: Cannot preview: document path is missing or invalid.
documents.title: Title
documents.errorBanner: At least one document with a valid file and type is required
documents.documentFileRequired: Document file is required for new entries
documents.atLeastOneDocumentRequired: At least one document is required

profileAccountCreated.title: Profile Created Successfully!
profileAccountCreated.accountCreatedMessage: A new account has been created for this jobseeker profile.
profileAccountCreated.profileCreatedMessage: The jobseeker profile has been created successfully.
profileAccountCreated.importantAccountNote: Please provide these credentials to the jobseeker. They will need them to log in to their account.
profileAccountCreated.importantProfileNote: The profile is associated with this email address.
profileAccountCreated.verificationNote: The profile is currently pending verification. Once verified, the jobseeker will be able to access all platform features.
profileAccountCreated.verificationNoteWithCredentials: The profile is currently pending verification. Once verified, the jobseeker will be able to access all platform features using these credentials.

profileSuccess.title: Profile Created Successfully!
profileSuccess.defaultMessage: The jobseeker profile has been created successfully.
profileSuccess.verificationNote: The profile is currently pending verification. Once verified, the jobseeker will be able to access all platform features.
